 Create the Integration Procedure with the Chatter Action
 An Integration Procedure sends a Chatter post to a user. This post includes text, an image, and mentions of two other users.
 Collect Ids for the Chatter Post
 Before you can create the Integration Procedure example with the Chatter Action, you must collect the Ids needed for assembling the Chatter post.
